attributes.title: HORRIBLE😡
attributes.review: Usually i would support president trump but this is getting too out of hand and if this app does good it just shows how brainwashed people are because i realized trump is an idiot who cant even run a country and he should also be thrown in jail for being a ped0

attributes.title: Disgraceful❤️repulsive✨mediocre🙊

attributes.title: Terrible and Embarrassing
attributes.review: Nothing in the app works. It’s embarrassing how incompetent the designers are except when you think about who is running the show then you understand that incompetence is a theme.

attributes.title: Does not pass the vibe check
attributes.review: I downloaded the app because Simon said so and was extremely disappointed to find out that Chester from the hot Cheetos brand ran the app. I mean I fully support his decision to get into politics, but I would much rather like to see him doing what he does best. Selling hot Cheetos, not running the country. I mean if you think about it from a cheetahs perspective, he has to run. But like not the country. He CAN run Cross Country though. Since he’s a cheetah he should be able to run extremely fast. According to Google Cheetahs can run at 58 mph so that’s pretty cool. Also I would just like to point out that the app itself kept crashing, but that was just a minor setback that I easily dealt with by getting a new phone.

attributes.title: Shisssst
attributes.review: This app is worse than a dog peeing on your foot

attributes.title: Dear, Petty Liberals
attributes.review: Getting trumps app taken down is just petty. Just because you disagree with someone politically, doesn’t mean you have to try and ruin their reputation. Trump 2020 4 MORE YEARS!!! 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸

attributes.title: Delete pls
attributes.review: You thought you could mess with us Bunker Boy 🧚🏻‍♀️✨✨🧚🏻‍♀️✨
